memberSignatures.value: protected override System.Linq.Expressions.Expression GenerateConversion (System.Linq.Expressions.Expression input, Type intermediate);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression GenerateConversion(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression input, class System.Type intermediate) cil managed

overloads.summary:
Generates a conversion from the source type to the intermediate type. This override
            will convert a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> value to a byte array prior to applying the base
            implementation.
